ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@pinkpig.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 11:36 AM To: eqbards@egroups.com Subject: [eqbards] Survey - System
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 11:36 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance


To keep this whole concept on topic, I'd like to start a survey of system
specs vs. apparent performance.
Just fill in the blanks and let's share what works and what doesn't!

Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: P3 550 overclocked to 650 or 866. (866 in winter, 650 in summer until I
get a new case for more cooling)
RAM: 512 mb
Video Card (and RAM): GeForce DDR w/ 32 mb
Video Resolution: 640 x 480 or 1024 x 768 (depends on my mood)
Sound Card: ESS 1868 (need to upgrade this big time)
HD speed (rpm): 7200 rpm
Net speed: DSL, 768 up and down
Geographic Location: NY, NY
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Double Layer
Particle Effects: High
Mip Mapping: Not available
Clip plane distance: Max

How many songs can you twist? 3 - 4 in the Old World
Do you slow down when it rains? No
How about in Unrest or Kunark? 2 - 3. Lately lag has been a major factor
I've been regularly seeing pings of 2000+ (while showing 0% at the same
time) When my ping is under 500 I can do 3 and 1/2 in Kunark.

Draelon Stormsong
Bard of the 48th song




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
